alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay; Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 3:05AM AKST until January 29 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta and Bristol Bay. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An extremely cold Arctic airmass remains in place over Southwest Alaska. The Kuskokwim Delta and Bristol Bay have observed frigid wind chills at or below -40. As winds lightly diminish through the end of the weekend, the Arctic airmass will stay in place, prolonging very cold wind chills. Temperatures will gradually rebound midweek next week.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
